mapper.select: SELECT section_id, section_name, section_sh_name, dept_id FROM tbl_section_mst WHERE del_flag = 0 ORDER BY section_id DESC, reg_date DESC;
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO tbl_section_mst ( section_name, section_sh_name, dept_id, reg_id ) VALUES ( #{section_name}, #{section_sh_name}, #{dept_id}, 1 );
mapper.update: UPDATE tbl_section_mst SET section_name=#{section.section_name}, section_sh_name=#{section.section_sh_name}, dept_id=#{section.dept_id}, update_id = 1 WHERE section_id = #{id}
